dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To uniquely identify and contact the victim
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Ensure the phone number is verified and active.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To quickly locate the victim and dispatch responders
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Use a GPS app or device to provide accurate location data.

dataElements.PreferredFormat: Enum (e.g., safe, injured, critically injured, missing)
dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To prioritize response efforts based on the victim's condition
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Ask the victim to report their health status honestly.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To tailor response efforts based on the specific disaster
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Ensure the disaster type is accurately reported.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To determine the scale of assistance required
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Include all individuals affected, including children and pets.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To identify the victim's specific needs and allocate resources accordingly
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Enumerate needs based on the disaster type (e.g., wildfire-specific needs: evacuation assistance, fire-resistant gear).

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To address special needs and ensure equitable assistance
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Provide detailed information to ensure appropriate assistance.

dataElements.PreferredFormat: Enum (e.g., evacuated, needs evacuation, unable to evacuate)

dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Update the status in real-time as the situation changes.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To direct victims to the nearest shelter or confirm their current shelter location
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Provide the exact location of the shelter if known.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To assess available resources to avoid duplication of efforts
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Be honest about available resources to avoid duplication of efforts.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To ensure pets are accounted for during evacuation or rescue
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Include the number and type of pets.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To assist with evacuation or rescue if vehicles are involved
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Provide detailed vehicle information if applicable.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To provide an alternative contact for follow-up or updates
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Ensure the emergency contact is verified and reachable.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To provide critical medical information for responders
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Be specific about medical conditions and allergies.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To provide visual evidence of damage for assessment and resource allocation
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Capture clear photos of damage to buildings, vehicles, or injuries.

dataElements.RationaleForCollecting: To provide real-time video footage of the situation
dataElements.HelpfulInformationForCollecting: Record and upload videos showing the extent of the disaster.
